hudson.tasks
Class Publisher

java.lang.Object
  hudson.tasks.Publisher
All Implemented Interfaces:
ExtensionPoint, Describable<Publisher>, BuildStep
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArtifactArchiver, BuildTrigger, Fingerprinter, JavadocArchiver, JUnitResultArchiver, Mailer
public abstract class Publisher
extends java.lang.Object
implements BuildStep, Describable<Publisher>, ExtensionPoint

BuildSteps that run after the build is completed.

To register a custom Publisher from a plugin, add it to BuildStep.PUBLISHERS.

Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi

prebuild in interface BuildStep

Default implementation that does nothing.
